svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - May 11 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 11, 2024" date: "2024-05-11"
Eth News and Links
All core devs â€“ execution (ACDE)
â€¢ ACDE #187 call video .Â Recap from Tim Beiko .Â Notes from Christine Kim : Pectra-devnet-0 : launch
early next week, some client teams completed implementations EIP7702 set EOA account code for one
transaction: successor to EIP3074, aimed at improving EOAs and aligned with ERC4337 account
abstraction Broad support for including in Pectra SSZ priority : client teams didnâ€™t support changing
to SSZ in Pectra EOF: Meta EIP & EIP7698 creation transaction added to Pectra considered for inclusion
EIP7623 increase calldata costs: gas sheltering concerns theoretically possible but deemed not viable
Reentrancy protection: EIP7705 reentrancy opcodes proposed to lower protection cost
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-0 : launch early next week, some client teams completed implementations
Pectra-devnet-0 : launch early next week, some client teams completed implementations
â€¢ EIP7702 set EOA account code for one transaction: successor to EIP3074, aimed at improving EOAs and
aligned with ERC4337 account abstraction Broad support for including in Pectra
EIP7702 set EOA account code for one transaction: successor to EIP3074, aimed at improving EOAs and
aligned with ERC4337 account abstraction
â€¢ Broad support for including in Pectra
â€¢ SSZ priority : client teams didnâ€™t support changing to SSZ in Pectra
SSZ priority : client teams didnâ€™t support changing to SSZ in Pectra
â€¢ EOF: Meta EIP & EIP7698 creation transaction added to Pectra considered for inclusion
EOF: Meta EIP & EIP7698 creation transaction added to Pectra considered for inclusion
â€¢ EIP7623 increase calldata costs: gas sheltering concerns theoretically possible but deemed not
viable
â€¢ Reentrancy protection: EIP7705 reentrancy opcodes proposed to lower protection cost
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade (meta EIP7600 ), small fork targeting late 2024
â€¢ consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.2 : test case fixes for Electra and fixes for PeerDAS initial interop
consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.2 : test case fixes for Electra and fixes for PeerDAS initial interop
â€¢ EVM Object Format (EOF) website, work in progress
EVM Object Format (EOF) website, work in progress
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% still too close to 33.3% threshold Proposal to create Lido Research to contribute
to minimal viable issuance research
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Proposal to create Lido Research to contribute to minimal viable issuance research
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~62% majority Figment went Geth
free Consensus layer: Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality Options for
validators to share client info : graffiti, gossip or voting
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~62% majority Figment went Geth free
Execution layer: Geth ~62% majority
â€¢ Figment went Geth free
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Options for validators to share client info : graffiti, gossip or voting
Options for validators to share client info : graffiti, gossip or voting
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Account abstraction breakout #2 call video Native account abstraction on Layer 1 not expected for
several years (after Osaka upgrade) EIP7702 succeeds EIP3074, account abstraction aligned with form
factor of EIP5806 (new transaction type) & user experience of EIP3074 Discussion on need for chain ID
& nonce in EIP7702
Account abstraction breakout #2 call video
â€¢ Native account abstraction on Layer 1 not expected for several years (after Osaka upgrade)
Native account abstraction on Layer 1 not expected for several years (after Osaka upgrade)
â€¢ EIP7702 succeeds EIP3074, account abstraction aligned with form factor of EIP5806 (new transaction
type) & user experience of EIP3074
EIP7702 succeeds EIP3074, account abstraction aligned with form factor of EIP5806 (new transaction
â€¢ Discussion on need for chain ID & nonce in EIP7702
Discussion on need for chain ID & nonce in EIP7702
â€¢ Vitalik: multidimensional gas pricing
Vitalik: multidimensional gas pricing
â€¢ History growth viz : history growing ~8x faster than state, nodes using 2TB drives will need to
upgrade in 2-3 years unless EIP4444 adopted to halve the storage burden
History growth viz : history growing ~8x faster than state, nodes using 2TB drives will need to
â€¢ Builder market centralization : private order flow & why builders win blocks
Builder market centralization : private order flow & why builders win blocks
Research
â€¢ Fork choice attacks and PeerDAS
Fork choice attacks and PeerDAS
â€¢ Asynchrony-resilient sleepy Total-Order Broadcast (TOB) protocols
Asynchrony-resilient sleepy Total-Order Broadcast (TOB) protocols
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Grandine v0.4.0/1 : optimizations, new attestations packer, in-memory mode,
improved compatibility with other validator clients, integrations with Eth-docker & Ethereum on Arm
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Grandine v0.4.0/1 : optimizations, new attestations packer, in-memory mode, improved compatibility
with other validator clients, integrations with Eth-docker & Ethereum on Arm
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth v1.14.3 : block processing & RPC API improvements
Execution layer:
â€¢ Geth v1.14.3 : block processing & RPC API improvements
For Stakers
â€¢ Geth DoS vulnerability via malicious p2p message , patched in v1.13.15
Geth DoS vulnerability via malicious p2p message , patched in v1.13.15
â€¢ EthStaker: hardware recommendations
EthStaker: hardware recommendations
Layer 2
â€¢ Rollcall (L2 standards) #5 call video : RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile) spec clarification & pricing,
RIP7696 presentation (generic double scalar multiplication precompile) and Layer 1 update
Rollcall (L2 standards) #5 call video : RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile) spec clarification & pricing,
â€¢ Commitment Boost : proposal to standardize how proposers register & send/receive commitments
Commitment Boost : proposal to standardize how proposers register & send/receive commitments
â€¢ Overview on based sequencing & preconfirmations
Overview on based sequencing & preconfirmations
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs: EIP7702 : Set EOA account code for one transaction EIP7703 : Increase calldata cost
(alternative to EIP7623 ) EIP7705 : NONREENTRANT & REENTRANT opcodes
EIPs:
â€¢ EIP7702 : Set EOA account code for one transaction
EIP7702 : Set EOA account code for one transaction
â€¢ EIP7703 : Increase calldata cost (alternative to EIP7623 )
EIP7703 : Increase calldata cost (alternative to EIP7623 )
â€¢ EIP7705 : NONREENTRANT & REENTRANT opcodes
EIP7705 : NONREENTRANT & REENTRANT opcodes
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7704 : Soul resonance token
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7704 : Soul resonance token
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Forge-std v1.8.2 : adds cheat codes including prompt, blobhashes & ensNamehash
Forge-std v1.8.2 : adds cheat codes including prompt, blobhashes & ensNamehash
â€¢ Solady (Solidity snippets): adds UpgradeableBeacon for ERC1967 beacon proxies
Solady (Solidity snippets): adds UpgradeableBeacon for ERC1967 beacon proxies
â€¢ Frangio: Solidity compiler code generation for stack-based EVM & stack too deep errors
Frangio: Solidity compiler code generation for stack-based EVM & stack too deep errors
â€¢ Viem experimental adds ERC6492 signature utilities
Viem experimental adds ERC6492 signature utilities
â€¢ Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.7.0 : adds detectors for Arbitrum Chainlink sequencer
uptime, readonly reentrancy with Balancer/Curve & price manipulation via token transfers
Slitherin (custom Slither detectors) v0.7.0 : adds detectors for Arbitrum Chainlink sequencer uptime,
readonly reentrancy with Balancer/Curve & price manipulation via token transfers
â€¢ Betterscan : inspect verified contracts
Betterscan : inspect verified contracts
â€¢ Profiling Echidna found memory leak in hevm
Profiling Echidna found memory leak in hevm
â€¢ Guide to building a tracer using Geth for transactions involving a set of addresses
Guide to building a tracer using Geth for transactions involving a set of addresses
â€¢ Etherscan converter tools : Base64, block & date, UTF-8 and method ID
Etherscan converter tools : Base64, block & date, UTF-8 and method ID
â€¢ CTFs: Secureum RACE #29: answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
CTFs:
â€¢ Secureum RACE #29: answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
Security
â€¢ Bloom $600k exploit on Blast related to rebasing yield, 90% of funds recovered
Ecosystem
â€¢ Etherscan: address poisoning attack explainer
Etherscan: address poisoning attack explainer
â€¢ ETHGlobal Sydney finalists
ETHGlobal Sydney finalists
â€¢ Verify RLN Proofs in resource restricted devices using subtrees
Verify RLN Proofs in resource restricted devices using subtrees
â€¢ Threshold encryption schemes for transaction pool privacy & timelock encryption
Threshold encryption schemes for transaction pool privacy & timelock encryption
Job Listings
â€¢ stakefish : DevOps Engineer & Full-stack Engineer
stakefish : DevOps Engineer & Full-stack Engineer
â€¢ Devcon: Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Devcon: Production Magician & Volunteer Coordinator
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.6 to 28 gwei, with 5.6 gwei average Zero net issuance currently
at 23.3 gwei 13k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 2.6 to 28 gwei, with 5.6 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 23.3 gwei
â€¢ 13k ETH net issuance this week
13k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,888 - $3,202, currently $2,914
ETHUSD : $2,888 - $3,202, currently $2,914
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.048 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Fantasy.top (CryptoTwitter fantasy sports game) 50% of mainnet NFT volume
Fantasy.top (CryptoTwitter fantasy sports game) 50% of mainnet NFT volume
â€¢ Tokenize.it Crowdinvesting : security tokens for German limited liability companies
Tokenize.it Crowdinvesting : security tokens for German limited liability companies
â€¢ BlackRock-backed Securitize applies for Arbitrum RWA incentives
BlackRock-backed Securitize applies for Arbitrum RWA incentives
â€¢ Zora acquired mint.fun
Zora acquired mint.fun
â€¢ Splits v2 : adds push flow, split can hold any token and splitters & token storage are separate
Splits v2 : adds push flow, split can hold any token and splitters & token storage are separate
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Robinhood received Wells Notice from SEC
Robinhood received Wells Notice from SEC
â€¢ President Biden plans to veto congressional disapproval of SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121 Trump
attacks Biden for being anti-crypto
President Biden plans to veto congressional disapproval of SEC Staff Accounting Bulletin 121
â€¢ Trump attacks Biden for being anti-crypto
â€¢ Crypto super PACs raised $102M for 2024 US elections
Crypto super PACs raised $102M for 2024 US elections
â€¢ Reminder: you can write to Virgil Griffith
Reminder: you can write to Virgil Griffith
General
â€¢ Next.js Server Actions Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability
Next.js Server Actions Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability
â€¢ Dell data breach of customer name & physical address
Dell data breach of customer name & physical address
â€¢ Spanish police identified Catalan activist via Wire & Proton Mail
Spanish police identified Catalan activist via Wire & Proton Mail
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-may-11-2024
